ratMessagehe:
He has taken your ball of yarn
to the rat house - come with me!
onecs: Rat has kept the yarn balls in his safe inside the house
twocs: To open that safe you will need a passcode
threecs: You will find a piece of the passcode in each of the rooms
fourcs: Go to each room to collect the passcode
fivecs: Hope you find your ball of yarn!
controlInstruction:
Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys for movement. Press ENTER
to perform actions like entering room and picking items.
sizePrefInstruction:
Try changing the size using the UP and DOWN buttons. Then
press ENTER to apply your selection and collect the passcode.
colorPrefInstruction:
Try changing the contrast using UP and DOWN buttons. Then
press ENTER to apply your selection and collect the passcode.
simplifyPrefInstruction:
Try changing the layout using UP and DOWN buttons. Then
press ENTER to apply your selection and collect the passcode.
backpackInstruction:
Press ALT to open backpack. Use LEFT and RIGHT to navigate
press ENTER to apply your selection. Again use ALT to close backpack.
soundPrefInstruction:
Try out the “show sounds” option using UP and DOWN buttons.
Then press ENTER to apply your selection and collect the passcode.
simplifyPrefCol1:
CONTENT

1. Home loans
made easy

2. Cheese
Stolen

3. Matrimonial
simplifyPrefCol2:
HOME LOANS
MADE EASY
The reserve
bank of ratsville
has decided to
turn down the
interests on the
home loans.
This serves to
be a great news
for rats who
planned to get
new ratholes.
simplifyPrefCol3:
THEFT CASE
A case of cheese
theft has been
filed in Tom Street.
Stay cautious.
cookieNote: **All these settings have been saved as a cookie in your browser
